name: Safehouse.chat
description:
A game about seeking social media fame during the apocalypse. 

You can send one tweet per day, look for trends and key words to make sure people see it. 

For the mini jam 47: Internet, the limitation was everything that can take damage dies in one hit.

INTRUCTIONS

The room:

WASD to move, spacebar to interact with objects. New hints are added each day for what the daily key words might be. 

The website:

Look through your timeline to see what people seem to be posting about that day. Then post your daily tweet about whatever you want, as long as it has the key words other people seem to be posting about.
